entry.value: create trigger $(triggerName) for $(schemaName)$(tableName) after insert as begin if ($(syncOnInsertCondition) and $(syncOnIncomingBatchCondition)) then begin insert into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data (table_name, event_type, trigger_hist_id, row_data, create_time) values( '$(targetTableName)', 'I', $(triggerHistoryId), $(columns), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ); insert into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data_event (node_id, data_id, channel_id, transaction_id) select node_id, gen_id($(defaultSchema)gen_$(prefixName)_data_data_id, 0), '$(channelName)', $(txIdExpression) from $(prefixName)_node c where (c.node_group_id='$(targetGroupId)' and c.sync_enabled=1 and (rdb$get_context('USER_SESSION', 'sync_node_disabled') is null or rdb$get_context('USER_SESSION', 'sync_node_disabled') != c.node_id)) $(nodeSelectWhere); end end
